A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film was a major disappointment. From the very first scene this movies dialog and acting is almost unwatchable. The plot is rambling and incoherent. There are no less than 6 opportunities to end this movie on a high note that fizzle into unsatisfying forced jeopardy. At no time did I feel any connection or involvement with any of the characters. The constant parade of this year's action figures was obvious and cheapen the film. Overall I regret seeing it. I can't believe this is in the same universe as rouge one.
